Title: Silverlight +OpenXML Page Turn
Description: This is a Silverlight proof of concept application that takes a simple Word document and displays it in the form of a book. I used Silverlight PageTurn demo as a foundation.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a Silverlight proof of concept application that takes a simple Word document and displays it in the form of a book. I used Silverlight PageTurn demo as a foundation.
